#summary Basic Login Dialog

= Introduction =

Basic dialog that requests the user for its credentials (user-id and password).

= Example =

{{{
public function doLogin():void {
  var dialog:LoginDialog = LoginDialog.newFor(this)
  dialog.slide = true
  dialog.title = 'Authorization Required'
  dialog.show(loginHandler)				
}
public function loginHandler(dialog:LoginDialog):void {
  Alert.show("login accepted:" + dialog.userText.text)
}
}}}

= Details =

[Internationalization NLS] labels used:
 * label.pleaselogin
 * label.userid
 * label.password
 * button.cancel
 * button.ok
 * link.forgottenpassword
